mapper.select: SELECT id, order_number, reserve_type, create_time, total_count, total_amount, discount_amount, total_pay_amount, order_status FROM dish_order WHERE customer_id=#{customerId}

SELECT dish_order_line.id,menu.id AS menu_id,dish_count,unit_price,specifications,`name` FROM dish_order_line LEFT JOIN menu ON dish_order_line.menu_id=menu.id WHERE dish_order_line.dish_order_id=#{dishorderId}

SELECT
box.id,room_number,room_name,'包厢' AS room_introduction FROM dish_order
LEFT JOIN reserve ON dish_order.reserve_id=reserve.id
LEFT JOIN reserve_box ON reserve_box.reserve_id=reserve.id
LEFT JOIN box ON reserve_box.box_id=box.id
WHERE dish_order.reserve_type='包厢预订' AND dish_order.id=#{dishorderId}
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM(SELECT tableBox1.box_id,room_number,room_name,'包厢' AS 'type' FROM dish_order
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT table_reserve.id,box.id AS box_id,room_number,room_name FROM table_reserve LEFT JOIN box ON table_reserve.table_box_id=box.id WHERE table_reserve.type='包厢') AS tableBox1
ON dish_order.reserve_id=tableBox1.id WHERE dish_order.reserve_type='扫码点餐' AND dish_order.id=#{dishorderId}
UNION ALL
SELECT tableBox2.table_id,number,table_name,'桌子' AS 'type' FROM dish_order
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT table_reserve.id,table.id AS table_id,number,table_name FROM table_reserve LEFT JOIN `table` ON table_reserve.table_box_id=`table`.id WHERE table_reserve.type='桌子') AS tableBox2
ON dish_order.reserve_id=tableBox2.id WHERE dish_order.reserve_type='扫码点餐' AND dish_order.id=#{dishorderId}) AS tablebox
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM(SELECT tableBox3.box_id,room_number,room_name,'包厢' AS 'type' FROM dish_order
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT table_reserve_home.id,box.id AS box_id,room_number,room_name FROM table_reserve_home LEFT JOIN box ON table_reserve_home.table_num=box.id WHERE table_reserve_home.type='包厢') AS tableBox3
ON dish_order.reserve_id=tableBox3.id WHERE dish_order.reserve_type='店外点餐' AND dish_order.id=#{dishorderId}
UNION ALL
SELECT tableBox4.table_id ,number,table_name,'桌子' AS 'type' FROM dish_order
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT table_reserve_home.id,table.id AS table_id,number,table_name FROM table_reserve_home LEFT JOIN `table` ON table_reserve_home.table_num=`table`.id WHERE table_reserve_home.type='桌子') AS tableBox4
ON dish_order.reserve_id=tableBox4.id WHERE dish_order.reserve_type='店外点餐' AND dish_order.id=#{dishorderId}) AS tablebox
